headline: Warren Buffett to Step Down by End of 2025. Here Are 3 Stocks He Might Buy on the Way Out
summary: Buffett will retire as Berkshire's CEO this year.  Warren Buffett has asked the board of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B) to replace him as chief executive officer by the end of 2025.  Now 94 years old, Buffett has been signaling a leadership transition for years, carefully building a team capable of heading the diversified business giant in the decades to come.
